channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.45 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.45

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Header visibility issue fixed
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now identify the startup parameters when an SAP Fiori elements application is launched as an embedded application from My Inbox
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adjust worker initialization

item.title: Version 1.108.33 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.33

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the documentation of the invokeAction method for the EditFlow controller extension
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now retaining the semantic date value correctly in the user defined variant on the analytical list page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that 'modifyStartupExtension' changes in the filter bar are retained post refresh
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of setting the page variant dirty when switching between the variants on the list report page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now avoid making the page variant dirty during external navigation scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with the chart selection in smart chart on the analytical list page
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: restore connection to SmartField
    • Type: FIX, Description: PersonalizationController: restore fixedColumnCount
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: ComboBox valueState is now correctly reset
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SmartVariantManagement: wait for translation finishing
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Improve PDF export error handling

item.title: Version 1.108.35 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.35

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display the correct timestamp when exporting dateTime fields to the XLS file format
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the code to accommodate the changes related to the hostname in the response from the gateway
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the method for detecting data loss to support nested app routes in My Inbox scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the logic that allows access to the multiselection plug-in for the UI tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly retrieve the table and prepare paging information when switching between the subobject items
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer consider the URL parameter, save-appvar-id, when initiating the app
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: UoM in display mode in table is rendered with correct width for chinese
    • Type: FIX, Description: BaseController: Error is no longer thrown when data is extended
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/resource/ResourceModel#_handleLocalizationChange: wait for resource bundle to be loaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests

item.title: Version 1.108.34 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.34

  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation from an object page to another application works correctly
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: buttons in split mode have separate tooltips
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: remove roledescription announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ProgressIndicator: Visual misalignment of percent value fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: adjust value help icon settings
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now retain the page variant correctly during external navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the focus handling logic for non-draft apps
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct setting value of single filter field when there is validation request
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: Restore connection to SmartField
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ResourceModel: Fix bundle reload after localizationChange
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: PDF Export - Apply limit

item.title: Version 1.108.42 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.42

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Prevent error when opening menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpProvider: Absolute Path is now correctly encoded
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: updating properties of type Edm.Binary
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Error with duplicate ID prevented

item.title: Version 1.108.43 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.43

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: appointments customData aggregation is written in DOM now
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: generated filters are now removed from service query
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat: Invalid groupingSize configuration disables grouping
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where select roles dialog could not be opened when no business role description is present
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDC: Include AdaptationFilterBar triggerSearch before invalidation

item.title: Version 1.108.44 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.44

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the SAP gateway issues for PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct css parameters for active Emphasized
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where changes to added or removed filters were not correctly tracked in the iAppState when a variant was marked dirty
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct IsCalendarDate (Edm.String) initialization in negative timezones
    • Type: FIX, Description: ChartProvider: formatter for DateTimeOffset without UTC
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor: Make qUnit tests version specific

item.title: Version 1.108.46 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.46

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: close picker on context change
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where changes made to the variant management-enabled table were lost during external navigation scenarios
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.export: Preserve patterns in template values

item.title: Version 1.108.48 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.48

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: In the list report, focus handling for addCards functionality is now improved

item.title: Version 1.120.32 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.32

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: side panel can be closed now
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added an aria-hidden attribute within Gantt chart to avoid the chart area from getting read out in the accessibility tool
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where changes to added or removed filters were not correctly tracked in the iAppState when a variant was marked dirty
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField Guid Type throwns validation error when key property missing in the model
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ThemeManager: Add detection for CSS preloads
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: updating properties of type Edm.Binary
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where select roles dialog could not be opened when no business role description is present
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: works correctly now
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix table flickering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Error with duplicate ID prevented

item.title: Version 1.120.36 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.36

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: prevent animation when initially shown
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the duplicate application names displayed in the list of related apps
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: GroupElement is now hidden when there are no visible children
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Out parameters applied on initial binding
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adjust worker initialization
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor: Make qUnit tests version specific

item.title: Version 1.120.38 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.38

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Header visibility issue fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ComboBox: Picker now closes on table scroll
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: add a view settings dialog items active announcement
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: exception when changing binding context
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataTreeBinding: $count requests must not contain $expand or $select
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.export: Preserve patterns in template values

item.title: Version 1.120.30 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.30

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that an error message is displayed when an unbound error occurs on imports in an action group
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m ScrollContainer: unstable QUnit tests are now skipped
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeSelection: Same separator for both date inputs
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've fixed issue where noDataText and noDataDescription was not getting set correctly
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where changes made to the variant management-enabled table were lost when it was refereshed without saving the variant
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the selection parameters passed through the URL are correctly applied in analytical list page applications
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the label contrast issue for stacked bar micro chart
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: GroupPanel: Show Field as Column fix
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: filterChange event is fired with correct value in case of Single Input and ValueList
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Remove restrictions for text size

item.title: Version 1.120.31 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.31

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the type-ahead suggestions weren't shown when focusing on a field for the first time
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the type-ahead suggestions weren't shown when focusing on a field for the first time
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer trigger a search when unknown parameters are passed
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer trigger a search when unknown parameters are passed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input controls: announced text is now following the guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus correctly restored
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue where the illustratedMessage provided by a user was being overridden
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the screen reader announcement for navigation and action tiles
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: correct overlap when in text mode
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adaptation project now supports modification of the application-level settings in the SAP delivered apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the message popover remained open even after the item link was clicked
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue where the Select All checkbox was disabled by introducing a configurable boolean property
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpProvider: Absolute Path is now correctly encoded
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControlFactoryBase: support config enabledMultiSelectionPlugin on value help create
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance

item.title: Version 1.120.29 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.29

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that duplicate parameters aren't passed to the filter bar
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation from an object page to another application works correctly
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input, sap.m.ComboBoxBase: Tests on macOS corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Redundant announcement on error state removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Navigate to details view when title is too long
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Speech output corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: ValueStateMessage with FormattedText displays links twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input controls with Suggestions: Value State message in header is no longer focusable
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the field visibility and updated the section title display on the object page
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: creation of instances for date time no longer sets UTC flag to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.FilterBar: Buttons are now visible on 320px screen size
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/IconPool: make mime type match case insensitive
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the focus is not moved to the last control in cases where an action opens a dialog popup

item.title: Version 1.120.39 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.39

  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: Fixed shapes drag drop issue when row highlight is enabled in Gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the rendering error of gantt chart total horizon on larger screens
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where application title and navigation were not consistent when object page was embedded in the My Inbox application

item.title: Version 1.120.33 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.33

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Fix title / text alignment of inverted status
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: appointments customData aggregation is written in DOM now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: headerContent controls are now selectable in UI Adapt mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.Engine: provide a way to pass event handler context to stateHandlerRegistry
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where a colon was not being displayed after the label in the object page header
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the object page stopped responding due to incorrect error message handling
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Ensuring flex library is loaded before loading Flex API's
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: isDigitalSequence ComboBox shows "00"
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: generated filters are now removed from service query
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat: Invalid groupingSize configuration disables grouping
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: P13nBuilder: load flex before usage
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: headerContent controls are now selectable in UI Adapt mode
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix AnchorBar accessibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: Fix fast navigation

item.title: Version 1.120.34 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.34

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: get appointment domref correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLink: Fix navigation to object page with correct parameters
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxpa.ObjectPageSubSection: Improved key handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior

item.title: Version 1.120.35 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.35

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the SAP gateway issues for PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct css parameters for active Emphasized
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: The correct ARIA label is now assigned to Object page header forms
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve removed incorrect ARIA labels that were assigned to the footer of an object page
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: remove default sorting on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpProvider: Validate filters on initial data fetch
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/format/NumberFormat.js: support rounding of numbers given as string
    • Type: FIX, Description: routing/History: avoid creating history entry when same hash is applied
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.PaneContainer: fix invalidation of nested panes

item.title: Version 1.120.37 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.37

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: add aria-expanded & aria-haspopup
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display tables defined within the com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.PresentationVariant annotation in the object page section
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Backslash (\) is no longer duplicated in filter tokens

item.title: Version 1.130.11 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.130.11

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the date by setting its type to medium, preventing conversion to short format
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the responsiveness issue in the gantt chart for chart display type
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed a screen reader issue where empty cells were announced as blank
    • Type: FIX, Description: For the process flow, we've now fixed the navigational issues, and have improved the announcement of empty cells when it is used with screen readers in VPC mode
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the message popover remained open even after the item link was clicked
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now preserve end user's unsaved table personalization by correctly handling empty string variants and retaining modified state after initialization

item.title: Version 1.133.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.133.3

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: side panel can be closed now
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the value help didn't work for create and inline create
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the screen reader announcement for navigation and action tiles
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartTable: DescriptionOnly paste uses correct type instance
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: zero guid is not exposed in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: MultiComboBox tokens are no longer duplicated on opening adapt filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpProvider: Absolute Path is now correctly encoded
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControlFactoryBase: support config enabledMultiSelectionPlugin on value help create
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Binding context for fixed-value scenarios is now synchronized
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Empty Filter for navigation properties

item.title: Version 1.136.7 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.7

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: prevent animation when initially shown
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: first token is now not truncated when not needed
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: Use activeElement of both light and shadow DOM to determine focus loss
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Fix image not visible, when initials are incorrect
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Invisible message is announced correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the SAP gateway issues for PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of tiles not scrolling left or right when buttons are pressed on the slideTile control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: correct CSS variable references
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: prevent calling ensureFilterLoaded on each onBeforeRendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartTable: correct metadata retrieval when conditionTypeInfo is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: suspend items binding of not visible controls
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: Use activeElement of both light and shadow DOM to determine focus loss
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/interaction: Cache failed requests to avoid retry attempts
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adjust worker initialization
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor: Make qUnit tests version specific
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: Invalid aria-labelledBy fixed

item.title: Version 1.136.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.1

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the documentation of the invokeAction method for the EditFlow controller extension
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that share links are correctly generated when adaptShareMetadata is overriden twice in a custom code
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the state of the flexible column layout wasn't stored correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request messages when an action is executed from the controller extension
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with setting a semantic object in the Field building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that messages are correctly handled when data is copied and pasted from external applications into tables
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that quick views can be opened from fields with criticality
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly validate conditions for 1:n property paths that are set using the setFilterValues API
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the date by setting its type to medium, preventing conversion to short format
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now configure the exportRequestSize parameter in tree and analytical tables using the Table building block or manifest.json file
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request messages when an action is executed from the controller extension
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue in the Table building block API that prevented showing or hiding columns
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with setting a semantic object in the Field building block
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now request messages when an action is executed from the controller extension
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Prevent selection if drag & drop enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: shows correctly the time part now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarRow: custom header row background on hover is correct now
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input controls: announced text is now following the guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the correct download parameter is set while downloading uploaded items using the table's download functionality
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the image inside a slide tile is adjusted based on the width of the tile
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: zero guid is not exposed in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: MultiComboBox tokens are no longer duplicated on opening adapt filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpProvider: Absolute Path is now correctly encoded
    • Type: FIX, Description: Column menu ignores displayBehaviour without description
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/interaction: Enhance Interaction Protocol for translation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel: updating properties of type Edm.Binary
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: use getter from prototype for 'nodeName'
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerMetadata.qunit: registerExtensionProvider deprecation
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where ContextBasedAdaptationsAPI.create does not consider manifest and annotation changes
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterField: show more-indicator on focus to other field
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix table flickering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: prevent duplicate ID error
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.BlockBase: Error with duplicate ID prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix visibility of title IconTabBar mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: ensure consistent async unstashing

item.title: Version 1.136.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.2

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the list report with a multi-input field displayed an error message when a draft was discarded in apps using the flexible column layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are executed correctly when a MultiValueField is changed in a table
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the resizing of the overflow toolbar
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Fix flexibility change handler
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: focus the button on mobile before firing press event
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.xConfigAPI: enhanceConfig with conditional destroy
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: tokens list stays opened for readonly MultiInput
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the unit of measure associated with the field in the smart link popover title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where changes to added or removed filters were not correctly tracked in the iAppState when a variant was marked dirty
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the AI-assisted Easy Filter did not correctly handle the Between (BT) and Not Between (NB) conditions, resulting in undefined values for the range
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the format of Between' (BT) operator is correctly maintained in the search metadata of the AI-assisted Easy Filter
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/KeyboardInteractionDisplay: Fix Normalization of single keys
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ColumnLayout as default
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Mdc.FieldBase: Mark keydown event on escape-induced valuehelp close
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Action visualization issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix cloning of "actions"
  • Library: sap.viz
    • Type: FIX, Description: Correct month and time calculation errors caused by numericFormatter

item.title: Version 1.136.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.3

  • Library: sap.fe.core

    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are executed before updating a document in an object page

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now identify the startup parameters when an SAP Fiori elements application is launched as an embedded application from My Inbox

    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartChart: Control property is removed from SmartLink
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Ensuring flex library is loaded before loading Flex API's

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: core: Prevent BlockLayer from being considered as focus candidate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataAnnotations: Propagate 'withCredentials' flag when loading annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce caching for sap/base/i18n/Localization
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app

  • Library: sap.ui.layout

    • Type: FIX, Description: core: Prevent BlockLayer from being considered as focus candidate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Remove redundant version visibility
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SimpleForm: use ColumnLayout as default
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: PropertyHelperUtil: check UI5 2.0 availability by deprecations

item.title: Version 1.136.8 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.8

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where side effects didn’t trigger any messages related to changes made on the subobject page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle errors that occur when creating content in building blocks at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where links in the Table building block within a custom section did not work correctly in object pages
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation from an object page to another application works correctly
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageToast: Message positions logic is now updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ComboBox: Picker now closes on table scroll
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: add aria-expanded & aria-haspopup
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the rendering issue of the interactive bar chart while navigating back to list report from an object page
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of inconsistent decimal digits shown in the smart charts
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataTreeBinding: $count requests must not contain $expand or $select
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.export: Preserve patterns in template values
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: SortFlex: Take sortOrder into account for affectedControl during condensing

item.title: Version 1.136.9 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.9

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the setSelectionVariant API works correctly in tables

    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the DataFieldForAction label was not translated in an error message
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the DataFieldForAction label was not translated in an error message

item.title: Version 1.136.10 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.10

item.title: Version 1.136.6 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.6

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitApp: busy indicator layer is now also over the master container

    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve removed incorrect ARIA labels that were assigned to the footer of an object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the text of AI-assisted easy filter tokens didn’t reflect the text arrangement of the selected value help entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the smart filter bar variant didn't reflect changes to the semantic date range fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: The correct ARIA label is now assigned to Object page header forms
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: routing/History: avoid creating history entry when same hash is applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/LocaleData: getAllCurrencyDigits ignores CLDR in case of custom currencies with DEFAULT
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: MultiValueField not working after upgrading to 1.136.1

item.title: Version 1.138.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.138.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: The `actions` property for the content of an Object Card is now deprecated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: side panel can be closed now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageHeader: fix headerContentLabel upon snap/unsnap
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now add print and export options to the Share menu
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the threshold for the number of rows initially loaded in a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now freeze columns in the Column Settings dialog and disable column freezing by using the disableColumnFreeze parameter
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now attach event handlers to the list binding of tables and retrieve the row count.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle paginator buttons when navigation is triggered
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with grouping conditions in responsive tables that use analytical services
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with sort and filter restrictions in table personalization in a containment scenario
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with invoking the DefaultValuesFunction on list bindings that include navigation paths
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the documentation of the invokeAction method for the EditFlow controller extension
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that share links are correctly generated when adaptShareMetadata is overriden twice in a custom code
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the state of the flexible column layout wasn't stored correctly
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use ReadOnly and Mandatory as FieldControl annotations for multi-input fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now add print and export options to the Share menu
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the threshold for the number of rows initially loaded in a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now freeze columns in the Column Settings dialog and disable column freezing by using the disableColumnFreeze parameter
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now attach event handlers to the list binding of tables and retrieve the row count.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle paginator buttons when navigation is triggered
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with the cut and copy enablement logic when multiple rows were selected
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that variant selection works correctly in tables with multiple views defined with different entity sets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that quick views can be opened from fields with criticality
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the date by setting its type to medium, preventing conversion to short format
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use ReadOnly and Mandatory as FieldControl annotations for multi-input fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the threshold for the number of rows initially loaded in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle paginator buttons when navigation is triggered
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that variant selection works correctly in tables with multiple views defined with different entity sets
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: endContent documentation is now updated
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: MenuItem: Add aria-expanded attribute
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap-icons-tnt: Updated icon fonts to v3.8 and v3.7 for Horizon, and to v2.13 and v2.12 respectively for older themes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.12 and v4.24
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StepInput: does not work with negative numbers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectMarker: text is displayed with small letter
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Hide settings icon in ColumnMenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu auto-closing in some cases
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StepInput: make binding higher prio
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now replaced the instanceof check for promises sent to itemValidationHandler with thenable check to handle the pollyfilled promises in UploadSetwithTable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Aligned English translation texts
    • Type: FIX, Description: QueryPanel: move item looses focus
    • Type: FIX, Description: Illustration Explorer: Fix deprecated illustrations handling and integration tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: fixed rowHeaderPress event firing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Update reset announce message for the screen reader
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.Engine: provide a way to pass event handler context to stateHandlerRegistry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: remove overriden setter for property multipleAppointmentsSelection since the functionality was moved in onBeforeRendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotofictionListGroup: Press is fired on enter
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Default button has correct hover color
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: property multipleAppointmentsSelection is not working when set in XML view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu positioning when only oordinates are provided
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Font rendering issue in Safari is fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Typo fixed jsdoc
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Reset action announcement added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: tokens list stays opened for readonly MultiInput
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the decorative property of avatar to true for action tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: CellSelector: Prevent selection if drag & drop enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct color in info toolbar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: CSS classes are propagated to the submenus
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: shows correctly the time part now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: MenuWrapper does not throw JS error when trying to close submenu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabHeader: prevent Firefox warning by avoiding getElementById with empty ID
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced a private read only flag to help the developers determine item sync delegation for the upload complete and item deletion actions
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the AI-assisted Easy Filter did not correctly handle the Between (BT) and Not Between (NB) conditions, resulting in undefined values for the range
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the format of Between (BT) operator is correctly maintained in the search metadata of the AI-assisted Easy Filter

    • Type: FIX, Description: We now load the RuntimeAuthoring library when key user adaptation is started

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap-icons-tnt: Updated icon fonts to v3.8 and v3.7 for Horizon, and to v2.13 and v2.12 respectively for older themes

    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: MultiComboBox tokens are no longer duplicated on opening adapt filters dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of inconsistent decimal digits shown in the smart charts

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: WebComponents - make base classes non-experimental

    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Allow module github links to OpenUI5 modules
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: APIREF Module link fixed

  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.fl: Fix bug where select roles dialog could not be opened when no role description is present
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now strictly check the TargetProperties and TargetEntities in the side effects against the application metadata
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: The `actions` property for the content of an Object Card is now deprecated

    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Changing a filter value now fires stateChanged event

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Field, FilterField: render Select for fixed value lists

    • Type: FIX, Description: Use proper icon for flip board button

item.title: Version 1.139.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.139.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Column resize using Up and Down keys enabled
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Child cards now reuse destinations from main card
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Manifest Resolver sample is fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: CardVariants test page is fixed
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now navigate to a specific object page in an app with multiple entity sets
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now group actions for the overflow toolbar.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now use a single batch request when an operation is executed for multiple items
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the popin layout for responsive tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now set a horizontal layout for a group of checkboxes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support checkbox groups in forms
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now hide FormElements when the visibility of all contained fields is set to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the list report with a multi-input field displayed an error message when a draft was discarded in apps using the flexible column layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are executed correctly when a MultiValueField is changed in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the deletion of parent and child nodes
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now group actions for the overflow toolbar.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the popin layout for responsive tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now set a horizontal layout for a group of checkboxes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support checkbox groups in forms
    • Type: FIX, Description: Undefined values in the value help table are now shown as empty cells
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the resizing of the overflow toolbar
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with data loading in the value help dropdown
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now group actions for the overflow toolbar.
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the popin layout for responsive tables

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu: Accessibility improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Unnecessary bold on tab text is now removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed endContent controls `press` event firing

    • Type: FIX, Description: List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: Focus handling for Menu open/close
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Legacy API removed from test
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Invisible message is announced correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: header interval announcements adjusted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: labelledby properly applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitButton: type announcement adjusted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: retain the minimum height of the empty placeholder
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now set the width of the File Preview dialog to 100% for the UploadSetWithTable plugin
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: introduce "level" and "titleStyle" properties to sap.m.PlanningCalendar header title
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Focus issue prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: fix scrolling down the page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: valueHelpIconSrc is applied correctly in mobile view

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed ExportUtil dependency for file downloads in the UploadSetwithTable plugin

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SemanticConfiguration: Improved text

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: aria-labelledby invisible text is set correctly

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.CheckBox: Wrapping in display-only mode corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: icon is correctly aligned now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Fix flexibility change handler
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: appointments customData aggregation is written in DOM now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: focus the button on mobile before firing press event
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: displayed correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: focus outline is fixed for high contrast themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: specialDates doesn't support date ranges
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.xConfigAPI: enhanceConfig with conditional destroy
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: toolbar does not overflow when it contains sap.m.Title
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: fixed context menu positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Provide information about aria-shortcutkey in the button description
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ColorPalette: adapt visual tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar move overriden setters in onBeforeRendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a PDF loads irrespective of the contentType if isTrustedSource is set to true
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SelectDialogBase: UI Flex restrictions now work correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: headerContent controls are now selectable in UI Adapt mode
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Summarize button no longer appears in UI adaptation mode when disabled

    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where table-related error messages displayed wrong or irrelevant information
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the object page stopped responding due to incorrect error message handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the value help metadata is loaded before the value help dialog opens in the AI-assisted easy filter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the contact facet displays correctly even when the email field is left empty
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the misalignment of No Data figure in the tile content of generic Tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of console errors being shown when the resizing of InteractiveBarChart was triggered
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of console errors being shown when the resizing of InteractiveBarChart was triggered
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: no exceptions in the console
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Padding added at the end of the text
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt: Link Shop Administration Tool app tests is now updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem: Tooltip behavior is now changed
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartVariantManagement: Return persistencyKey default empty string for FilterBar
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Ensuring flex library is loaded before loading Flex API's
    • Type: FIX, Description: Fix HistoryOptOutProvider tests to handle multiple calls correctly

    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Error state is now shown when the value is empty and mandatory
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Cell Selector is now dependend of the Smart Table in Value Help Dialog

    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: isDigitalSequence ComboBox shows "00"
  • Library: sap.ui.core

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
    • Type: FIX, Description: core: Prevent BlockLayer from being considered as focus candidate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataAnnotations: Propagate 'withCredentials' flag when loading annotations
    • Type: FIX, Description: base/DataType: log error once per class and property combination
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/KeyboardInteractionDisplay: Fix Normalization of single keys
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.NumberFormat: Invalid groupingSize configuration disables grouping
    • Type: FIX, Description: ComponentContainer: always propagate propagation listeners

item.title: Version 1.139.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.139.1

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now exclude hidden properties in an analytical table when using the Export feature in split mode
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with selecting cells in a grid table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the setSelectionVariant API works correctly in tables
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ComboBox: qUnit tests are now stabilized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: first token is now not truncated when not needed
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: Use activeElement of both light and shadow DOM to determine focus loss
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: add aria-expanded & aria-haspopup
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Fix image not visible, when initials are incorrect
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the rendering issue of the interactive bar chart while navigating back to list report from an object page
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: stop calling suspend on item bindings if it suspended
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: prevent calling ensureFilterLoaded on each onBeforeRendering
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core: make sap/ui/Device a standard AMD module
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap/ui/base: enable static inheritance for UI5 classes
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: Use activeElement of both light and shadow DOM to determine focus loss
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/interaction: Cache failed requests to avoid retry attempts
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.config: fix logging for URL parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/AppCAcheBuster.js: Core.ready() does not resolve
  • Library: sap.ui.export

  • Library: sap.ui.layout

  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection - hidden title aria-labelledby

item.title: Version 1.140.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.140.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Child cards are now enabled to use main card destinations
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.ProductSwitchItem: Added imageSrc property
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.cards.BaseHeader: Reorganized the Card Header layout to relocate StatusText and timestamp
  • Library: sap.fe.controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Keyboard Shortcuts popup window either matches the custom theme used in other windows, or uses the default SAP Horizon theme as a fallback option
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide tooltips for all filter fields in the filter bar using the QuickInfo annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where links in the Table building block within a custom section did not work correctly in object pages
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that values of fields with a static '%' unit are displayed correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the performance of tables that contain a MultiValueField
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are executed before updating a document in an object page
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide tooltips for all filter fields in the filter bar using the QuickInfo annotation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now format the selected value in fields of the action parameter dialog when the value help of the field uses a text annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now check for duplicates before templating new fields for UI adaptation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that values of fields with a static '%' unit are displayed correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the performance of tables that contain a MultiValueField

    • Type: FIX, Description: VariantManagement: Indicate version for setCurrentVariantKey

item.title: Version 1.141.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.141.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: List of child cards introduced
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Header visibility issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: prevent animation when initially shown
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Rendering of unit of measurement in the Numeric Header
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Footer overlap prevented
  • Library: sap.fe.ariba
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now disable navigation on specific rows of a table
  • Library: sap.fe.base
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide an experimental API to support the collaborative draft in reuse components
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now preserve the exact decimal places returned from the back end for currency values
  • Library: sap.fe.controls
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now disable navigation on specific rows of a table
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve added additional export settings for columns
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide an experimental API to support the collaborative draft in reuse components
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now disable navigation on specific rows of a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now preserve the exact decimal places returned from the back end for currency values
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now reduce the number of requests when discarding a draft
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where side effects didn’t trigger any messages related to changes made on the subobject page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle errors that occur when creating content in building blocks at runtime
  • Library: sap.fe.ina
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now disable navigation on specific rows of a table
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve added additional export settings for columns
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide an experimental API to support the collaborative draft in reuse components
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now disable navigation on specific rows of a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now preserve the exact decimal places returned from the back end for currency values
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use Empty and NotEmpty filter operators for date fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve added milliseconds as a filter option to the DateTimeOffset property
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the DataFieldForAction label was not translated in an error message
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’ve added additional export settings for columns
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now disable navigation on specific rows of a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the DataFieldForAction label was not translated in an error message
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation from an object page to another application works correctly
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.13 and v4.24
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: A hand pointer has been added for the hover state
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TabContainer propagate tooltip to TabStrip items when binding data is updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ToggleButton: fixed hover colors for ToggleButton of type Ghost
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: Next button is now hidden on mobile devices when disabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NavContainer: Fix wrong navigation result
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Added proper aria-labelledby for custom headers
    • Type: FIX, Description: p13n.SelectionPanel: fix spacing for hide unselected button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: subtitle updates are now reflected in details
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarAppointment: added 'ariaLabelledBy' association
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SegmentedButton improve aria attributes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePickerClocks: fix appearance on first open of control
    • Type: FIX, Description: AdaptFiltersPanel: Skip updateFinished logic, if in group view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuWraper: respects content density
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Fix image not visible, when initials are incorrect
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog/Popover: Styles are fixed when integrated with WebC
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the SAP gateway issues for PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Prevent navigation on modifier key press
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: set label to correct elements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ColorPalette: adjust keyboard interactions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of tiles not scrolling left or right when buttons are pressed on the slideTile control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SegmentedButton: fixed initial truncation of some button texts
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: correct CSS variable references
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.StepInput: Prevent overwriting incorrect values in the internal input
    • Type: FIX, Description: Texts are now selectable on mobile devices
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RatingIndicator: reset rating on second click of the same star
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SegmentedButton: improved button width calculation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Press event is fired correctly on pressing SPACE
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Set shadow style according to the "showArrow" property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: Added optional chaining to avoid errors when MenuWrapper is not present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: Fix binding of menu items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: adjust picker accessible name
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SuggestionsPopover: Correct text color for additional info
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct css parameters for active Emphasized
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now configure the settings of related apps using the extension controller
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Delete button visibility on subobject page tables is now controlled by DeleteRestriction through NavigationRestriction
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the chart measure wasn't visible in the Evening Horizon theme
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where navigating back to the object page from a draft entity after activation using a determining action caused errors
    • Type: FIX, Description: InvokeActions extension API now executes in strict mode and handles HTTP status code 412 (Precondition Failed) responses with a confirmation dialog
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the border was not visible in comparison micro charts
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationList: Application of sapTntNLISelected class is corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: SmartChart: Notification is now provided when measures or dimensions are insufficient for the selected chart type
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: prevent calling ensureFilterLoaded on each onBeforeRendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartVariantManagement: Return persistencyKey default empty string for FilterBar
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartTable: correct metadata retrieval when conditionTypeInfo is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: suspend items binding of not visible controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartVariantManagement: Show default variant, if currently selected one is deleted
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.13 and v4.24

    • Type: FIX, Description: Enable multiple DraftEnabledMockServer

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/LocaleData: getAllCurrencyDigits ignores CLDR in case of custom currencies with DEFAULT
    • Type: FIX, Description: Lib.js: fix loading of '-lazy' bundles
    • Type: FIX, Description: F6Navigation: Correctly identify active element in nested web components
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: The function import dialog now correctly passes empty parameter values to the back end
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support fixed value list validation for combo boxes in function import dialogs
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: List of child cards introduced
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: Update ACC test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Rendering of unit of measurement in the Numeric Header
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: mdc.Chart: Notification is now provided when measures or dimensions are insufficient for the selected chart type
    • Type: FIX, Description: AdaptFiltersPanel: Skip updateFinished logic, if in group view

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: RichTextEditor: Custom fonts are now enabled
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Header buttons a11y improvement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarAppointment: added 'ariaLabelledBy' association
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Month: removed redundant "selected" announce
  • Library: sap.ushell

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ushell.ui.shell.ShellAppTitle: Ensure default key down event handling is executed.
    • Type: FIX, Description: Workzone Navigation from dirty application
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ushell.ShellBar: Shortcuts for Logo and AppFinder corrected.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ushell.ShellBar: Search Field loading issues in slow environments improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ushell.ui.shell.ToolAreaItem: Width adjusted to NavigationListItem for visual correct displaying of ScrollBar
    • Type: FIX, Description: keep alive on home app

    • Type: FIX, Description: Back Navigation for Web Dynpro Compatibility Mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ushell.ShellBar: Max amount of content removed in case of ShellBar is used.
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Press event is fired correctly on pressing SPACE
  • Library: sap.viz
    • Type: FIX, Description: Extended Colors: Exclude the specified charts
  • Library: deprecated

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the colorPalette property in the Status building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide an API on the Table building block to select contexts or clear the selection

    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now use the WebSocketBaseURL annotation with a relative path
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now exclude hidden properties in an analytical table when using the Export feature in split mode
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use separators for grouped actions

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: prevent failing request when src=nullable value

    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: Use activeElement of both light and shadow DOM to determine focus loss
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabHeader: Move the focus to selected tab after selectedKey is updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: first token is now not truncated when not needed
    • Type: FIX, Description: xConfig: Remove correct value
    • Type: FIX, Description: SelectionPanel: (De)select all should ignore hidden items
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: add aria-expanded & aria-haspopup
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the tab reading order for the FeedListItem control and fixed the disappearance of action button in FeedListItem
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Improve accessibility in Last/Next Options

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now prevent unintended navigation after executing an action in an object page table

    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support subsection-level loading behavior with the SubSectionId in the manifest.json file

    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the visibility of the file uploader button was not set correctly when dynamically controlled by a field control value
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where selection in filter-selection lists did not reflect in the visual filter bar in analytical list page applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the enablement state of table toolbar buttons on the list report page was not updated correctly after returning from the object page following a property change
